sub_agents.name: research_agent

sub_agents.description: Specialized in code generation and debugging

sub_agents.description: Performs data analysis and generates insights

sub_agents.description: Audits code for repeated patterns, anti-patterns, and systemic consistency issues

sub_agents.name: grub_integrator
sub_agents.description: Validates core/grub aggregation and kernel param composition
